CustomField.formula: IF( Current_Year__c ,CASE( MONTH(TODAY()), 1, Dec_Revenue_Amount__c+ Jan_Revenue_Amount__c, 2, Jan_Revenue_Amount__c+ Feb_Revenue_Amount__c, 3, Feb_Revenue_Amount__c + Mar_Revenue_Amount__c, 4, Mar_Revenue_Amount__c + Apr_Revenue_Amount__c, 5, Apr_Revenue_Amount__c + May_Revenue_Amount__c, 6, May_Revenue_Amount__c+Jun_Revenue_Amount__c, 7, Jul_Revenue_Amount__c, 8, Jul_Revenue_Amount__c + Aug_Revenue_Amount__c, 9, Aug_Revenue_Amount__c + Sep_Revenue_Amount__c, 10, Sep_Revenue_Amount__c + Oct_Revenue_Amount__c, 11, Oct_Revenue_Amount__c + Nov_Revenue_Amount__c, 12, Nov_Revenue_Amount__c+Dec_Revenue_Amount__c, 0),0)
CustomField.label: {hidden}OrgRevenue in last 2 months
